author: @sentdex
text: Probably not closing your quotes, and you're literally echoing out the end, which ends with that semi colon, then the closing curly, then the ending of php tags is ?>.

author: @sentdex
text: You could try using double quotes, and then just using $variable inside them.  So like "user's name is $name and their age is $age."
